com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest.impl

Class RestResponseCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal.caching.AbstractCache<HashableHttpRequest,RestResponse>
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest.impl.RestResponseCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Map<HashableHttpRequest,RestResponse>

    public class RestResponseCache
extends AbstractCache<HashableHttpRequest,RestResponse>

    Concrete implementation of AbstractCache for caching REST responses. The cache is keyed off of a HashableHttpRequest, which is a wrapper for HttpUriRequest that implements hashCode and equals methods.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 08/15/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • getFileNameForKey

        public java.lang.String getFileNameForKey(HashableHttpRequest request)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCache
        Only meaningful if disk caching is enabled. See AbstractCache.enableDiskCache(android.content.Context, int). Turns a cache key into the file name that will be used to persist the value to disk. Subclasses must implement this.
        Specified by:
        getFileNameForKey in class AbstractCache<HashableHttpRequest,RestResponse>
        Parameters:
        request - the cache key
        Returns:
        the file name
